content: I just merged @sinwar's work on extracting the development login page, which now means that it's way easier to test the normal password-based login flow (via just visiting /login rather than /devlogin rather than needing to edit a settings file).

I'd love feedback on the new setup and whether there's other things we should do to make life convenient.

I guess there's a few follow-ups we should do:

  • Make it easier to get "valid" passwords for the development users.
  • Disable the tutorial when logging in as one of the initial users.
  • Update the documentation on manual testing to cover this.
I'll just fix tutorial right now; should take like 2 minutes :)
oops edited to have the right commit
